Operation.Caption: 引入库存
保存
完成
撤销完成

Query.Description: 查询事务类型中的物料状态
Query.Statement: select l.MaterialStatusId from LRP_WhTxType_MS l join LRP_WarehouseTxType h on h.oid=l.soid where h.code = ?
select OID from LRP_KittingNotice_H where No = ?
select l.OID from LRP_KittingNotice_H h join LRP_KittingNoticeProduct_L l on h.OID = l.SOID where h.No = ? and l.MaterialId = ?

Grid.Caption: 原料明细

QueryDef.Statement: select BasicUnit as N_KEY,BasicUnit as N_NAME from LRP_Material where OID=? union select PackingUnit as N_KEY,PackingUnit as N_NAME from LRP_Material where OID=?

Grid.Caption: 成品明细

Filter.Query: select OID from LRP_Material where LRP_Material.OID in (select MaterialId from LRP_KittingNoticeProduct_L where SOID = ?)

QueryDef.Statement: select BasicUnit as N_KEY,BasicUnit as N_NAME from LRP_Material where OID=? union select PackingUnit as N_KEY,PackingUnit as N_NAME from LRP_Material where OID=?

MacroCollection.Macro: select StoreroomId from LRP_Storearea where oId = ?
